description: A handy sword made out of remains of BL9 tendril's blades
A handy tonfa made out of remains of BL9 incredible high quality of which puzzles ones who know nothing about origin of BL9 which is not only a material used for weapons
A whip made out of a BL9 worm-like parasite that is capable of stretching and swinging itself
Sturdy razor-sharp claws made out of remains of the Blind Clawer's claws infused with BL9
A very strong and a durable glaive made out of remains of Repto's claws
A very sharp sword with multiple protrusions on it made out of BL9 spike samples
A razor sharp, very well cutting whip made out of BL9 Assassin's tail samples
A huge axe that somehow this strange tentacle sample manages to take the form of, forming both the long handle and a huge blade

description: A pair of bladed claws which are used to deal significant amount of damage by applying very little force to the tentacles attached to them
A polearm made of BL9 taking the form of a worm-like parasite with multiple protrusions all over it that is able to stretch and swing itself
A flail with a tentacle as it's chain end of which is a spiky ball made of some strange and very hard tissue
An even more intimidating and vicious looking, incredibly strong glaive made out of evolved Repto's claws
A giant sleek looking sword made out of remains of BL9-infused Chimera's pincers
Modified, hardened and strengthened BL9-infused claws that have a greatly increased size, has a much more intimidating look and an absurdingly bizarre resemblance to Eastern fans
A giant sledgehammer with multiple spiky protrusions made from a leg of a horribly mutated carapaceon BL9-infused creature

hit_you_effect.npc_message: As %1$s strikes with the blade it emits electrified arcs of BL9 at %2$s wildly!

description: THIS GOES KABOOOOOOOM.
THIS IS KABOOOOOOMMMMIIINNNGGGG

A soldering iron that has somehow been infused with the entirely sentient BL9 that somehow mentally communicates with you, it is covered and entirely reinforced with it's thick tissue with multiple spiky almost unnoticeabely vibrating protrusions that give it a more intimidating, animate look,
